rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 24 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:45 AM, 10 July 2025(Thursday)



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Metro Manila, Laguna, Batangas, Rizal, Bulacan and Pampanga within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Cavite(General Trias, Tanza, Trece Martires, Naic, Maragondon, Ternate), Zambales(San Antonio, Subic) and Bataan(Abucay, Balanga, Pilar, Orion) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
